TITLE: ‘America has achieved a tremendous scientific breakthrough’
SUMMARY: Fusion energy has long been a dream for scientists who say the technology will enable cheap, plentiful power that does not produce the planet-heating gases or pollution that come with burning fossil fuels.

TITLE: What to know about DOE’s fusion ‘breakthrough’
SUMMARY: Experiments at a U.S. government lab may have provided "proof that the physics work." But future fusion reactors might turn to a different technology for replicating the energy that powers the sun.

TITLE: ‘It’s one of the biggest results of science in the past 20-30 years’
SUMMARY: But turning the newest breakthrough at a U.S. Energy Department lab into abundant, carbon-free power may require hundreds of billions of dollars. And many technical hurdles await.

TITLE: What to know about DOE’s fusion milestone
SUMMARY: Experiments at a U.S. government lab may have provided "proof that the physics work." But future fusion reactors might turn to a different technology for replicating the energy that powers the sun.
